Uses of Interface
org.jfree.chart.labels.XYItemLabelGenerator

  • Packages that use XYItemLabelGenerator 
    Package Description
    org.jfree.chart.labels
    Generators and other classes used for the display of item labels and tooltips.
    org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy
    Plug-in renderers for the XYPlot class.

    • Uses of XYItemLabelGenerator in org.jfree.chart.labels

      Classes in org.jfree.chart.labels that implement XYItemLabelGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BubbleXYItemLabelGenerator
      An item label generator defined for use with the XYBubbleRenderer class, or any other class that uses an XYZDataset.
      class  HighLowItemLabelGenerator
      A standard item label generator for plots that use data from a OHLCDataset.
      class  IntervalXYItemLabelGenerator
      An item label generator for datasets that implement the IntervalXYDataset interface.
      class  StandardXYItemLabelGenerator
      A standard item label generator for plots that use data from an XYDataset.
      class  SymbolicXYItemLabelGenerator
      A standard item label generator for plots that use data from an XYDataset.

    • Uses of XYItemLabelGenerator in org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy

      Methods in org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy that return XYItemLabelGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XYItemLabelGenerator YIntervalRenderer.getAdditionalItemLabelGenerator()
      Returns the generator for the item labels that appear near the lower y-value.
      XYItemLabelGenerator XYItemRenderer.getBaseItemLabelGenerator()
      Returns the base item label generator.
      XYItemLabelGenerator AbstractXYItemRenderer.getBaseItemLabelGenerator()
      Returns the base item label generator.
      XYItemLabelGenerator AbstractXYItemRenderer.getItemLabelGenerator()
      Deprecated. 
      As of version 1.0.6, this override setting should not be used. You can use the base setting instead (AbstractXYItemRenderer.getBaseItemLabelGenerator()).
      XYItemLabelGenerator XYItemRenderer.getItemLabelGenerator(int row, int column)
      Returns the item label generator for a data item.
      XYItemLabelGenerator AbstractXYItemRenderer.getItemLabelGenerator(int series, int item)
      Returns the label generator for a data item.
      XYItemLabelGenerator XYItemRenderer.getSeriesItemLabelGenerator(int series)
      Returns the item label generator for a series.
      XYItemLabelGenerator AbstractXYItemRenderer.getSeriesItemLabelGenerator(int series)
      Returns the item label generator for a series.
      Methods in org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy with parameters of type XYItemLabelGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void XYBarRenderer.drawItemLabel(java.awt.Graphics2D g2, XYDataset dataset, int series, int item, XYPlot plot, XYItemLabelGenerator generator, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bar, boolean negative)
      Draws an item label.
      void YIntervalRenderer.setAdditionalItemLabelGenerator(XYItemLabelGenerator generator)
      Sets the generator for the item labels that appear near the lower y-value and sends a RendererChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
      void XYItemRenderer.setBaseItemLabelGenerator(XYItemLabelGenerator generator)
      Sets the base item label generator and sends a RendererChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
      void AbstractXYItemRenderer.setBaseItemLabelGenerator(XYItemLabelGenerator generator)
      Sets the base item label generator and sends a RendererChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
      void XYItemRenderer.setItemLabelGenerator(XYItemLabelGenerator generator)
      Deprecated. 
      As of version 1.0.6, this override setting should not be used. You can use the base setting instead (XYItemRenderer.setBaseItemLabelGenerator(XYItemLabelGenerator)).
      void AbstractXYItemRenderer.setItemLabelGenerator(XYItemLabelGenerator generator)
      Deprecated. 
      As of version 1.0.6, this override setting should not be used. You can use the base setting instead (AbstractXYItemRenderer.setBaseItemLabelGenerator(XYItemLabelGenerator)).
      void XYItemRenderer.setSeriesItemLabelGenerator(int series, XYItemLabelGenerator generator)
      Sets the item label generator for a series and sends a RendererChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
      void AbstractXYItemRenderer.setSeriesItemLabelGenerator(int series, XYItemLabelGenerator generator)
      Sets the item label generator for a series and sends a RendererChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
